message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $9,000 is quite a bit below my bottom line.  Could you do $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $10,500?
